titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry star Stonewall Jackson at the Loudoun Valley High School

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and red on white) announcing the Grand Ole Opry stars Stonewall Jackson, Barbara Allen and the Kountry Kings, Johnny Norris and the Free State Boys, Ed Cassidy and Freddie Stafford and the Wildcats at the Loudoun Valley High School on April 5. Poster features metal photoplates of Stonewall Jackson, Barbara Allen and the Kountry Kings, Johnny Norris and the Free State Boys and Freddie Stafford.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
